text: Stephen Ira Adler (born March 23, 1956) is an American lawyer and Democratic politician. He was been the Mayor of Austin, Texas from January 6, 2015 to January 6, 2023. Adler won reelection in 2018, getting 59% of the vote in a 7-way race. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Washington, D.C. Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C. Category:Mayors of Austin, Texas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Steve Adler (politician)
